ygData.subject: RE: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: You are missin the point - there needs to be a slot for our instruments - like there is a slot for a bow. ... with the subject submissions.
ygData.messageBody:
You are missin the point - there needs to be a slot for our instruments -
like there is a slot for a bow.


At 02:05 PM 11/21/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>aye, but there is no instrument button. the way it tells now whether you
>wish the song to use instruments or to just sing it is if you are holding an
>instrument you play it, if you are holding weapons you sing. if you are
>holding both, then what?
>
>Shada
>
>
>>
>> From: silky@...
>>
>>
>> Same way it tells if you are shooting a bow - you hit range -
>> in our case,
>> we could choose instruments - and cancel if we wanted to go
>> back to our
>> weapons.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
